# Add a GPR trace on a plot

```r
## S3 method for class 'GPR'
lines(x, relTime0 = FALSE, ...)

## S3 method for class 'GPRsurvey'
lines(x, ...)
```

## Arguments

- `x`: (`GPR class`)
- `relTime0`: (`logical[1]`) If `TRUE`, shift `x` to time- zero.
- `...`: Additional parameters to be passed to `lines()`.

Add a GPR trace on a plot
